TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MembershipProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: 继承 抽象类的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的成员资格提供程序是由类的属性以只读方式公开的 。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定成员资格提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的成员身份信息，以及访问不属于抽象类的成员资格提供程序的自定义成员 。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成员资格功能，请参阅 " [成员资格简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100)) "，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅 [使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序以及其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

span.span: Introduction to Membership

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用将 角色提供程序对象复制到指定的数组。This method uses to copy role provider objects to the specified array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将的 内容复制 到对象的数组中 。The following code example uses the method to copy the contents of a to an array of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的成员资格提供程序是由类的属性以只读方式公开的 。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 您可以按名称访问集合中的特定成员资格提供程序，并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型（如） 。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以在单个应用程序中管理多个数据存储区中的成员身份信息，以及访问不属于抽象类的成员资格提供程序的自定义成员 。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 按名称从类的属性访问为应用程序配置的 。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
